title: Viva Las Vegas
description: At the start of the new millennium a group of men terrorized Las Vegas, leaving a path of destruction in the desert and investigators scrambling to stop a series of armored truck heists that plagued Sin City.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
